div.p: To be quite honest it can be challenging, we have got some young people or have had young people in the past with behavioural difficulties
so you know stopping fights, confrontation, I would say that’s the hardest part of the job. Obviously working with young people,
working with people in general, it’s not something you can go home and lock off because, you know, you are emotionally involved with it
so that can be difficult sometimes.
